meanings.definition: Happening or starting not long ago
meanings.sent1: The recent rain made the grass wet.
meanings.sent2: I bought a recent book that just came out.
meanings.sent3: The recent snowfall surprised everyone in the town.
meanings.sent4: Her recent promotion brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The recent news of the discovery spread quickly.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the present or the immediate past
meanings.sent1: The recent trends in fashion are colorful.
meanings.sent2: She visited a recent art exhibition in the city.
meanings.sent3: The recent music concert was a blast.
meanings.sent4: His recent behavior at work raised some concerns.
meanings.sent5: The recent memories of the trip made her smile.
